column23: Detect DNS Tunneling Activity by Entropy Score
column28: The alert condition for '$name$' was triggered.Time     : $result._time$Host     : $result.src$Query   : $result.query$Entropy Score : $result.Entropy_score$Severity : HighMacroview SOC
column29: Detect DNS Tunneling Activity by Entropy Score by host : $result.src$
column39: Discovers DNS Tunneling Activity and there may be abnormal connection related to Ransomware /Malware Activity.
column40: Detect DNS Tunneling Activity by Entropy Score by host : $src$
column59: Discovers DNS Tunneling Activity and there may be abnormal connection related to Ransomware /Malware Activity.
column67: | from datamodel:"Network_Resolution"."DNS" | stats  values(query) as query by _time ,src | where query!="unknown" | `ut_shannon(query)` | rename ut_shannon as Entropy_score | where Entropy_score > 4.5 | dedup query | sort - _time | eval _time = strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%S")
